creditline: Gift of Mrs. Charles S. Pillsbury
description: Goblet with round foot and short baluster stem with faceted knop, engraves with battle of the Peacock and the Hornet (two tall-sail ships), about 1820. Purchased from the grand-daughter of the Captian of the Hornet about eight years ago in Richmond.
title: War of 1812 Rummer, or goblet
